meta.description: Hackerspace NTNU, a student-led project open to all students, offers access to new technology like 3D printers and VR equipment. Our members provide varied expertise to help with your projects, from making an LED light blink to creating a 3D model. Visit our workshop or join our Slack channel for assistance or a friendly chat.

error.errorDescription: Don't worry, our best hackers are on it!

privacy.atHackerspace: At Hackerspace, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is processed in accordance with applicable laws, including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, protect and share your personal data when you visit, use or interact with our website.
privacy.dataResponsability: 1. Who is responsible for your data?
privacy.yourData: We are the entity responsible for the processing of your personal data, and we are committed to ensuring that your privacy is safeguarded.
privacy.weCollect: We collect the following personal data:
privacy.weCollectListItemOne: Contact information: Name, email address, telephone number (if you provide this through forms on our website).
privacy.weCollectListItemTwo: Usage data: Information about how you use our website, such as IP address, device type, browser type, and time of visit.
privacy.weCollectListItemThree: Cookies: We use cookies to improve your user experience on the website. This may include preferences, visit history and other technical information.
privacy.weCollectListItemFour: Other data: We may collect data that you voluntarily provide to us, for example by filling in forms or sending emails.
privacy.howWeUseData: How do we use your data?
privacy.forTheFollowing: We use your personal data for the following purposes
privacy.forTheFollowingListItemOne: Behandle bestillinger, svare på henvendelser, sende relevant informasjon
privacy.forTheFollowingListItemTwoSpan: Process orders, respond to inquiries, send relevant information
privacy.forTheFollowingListItemTwo: Understand how the website is used, improve content and functionality.
privacy.forTheFollowingListItemThree: With your consent, we can send you newsletters and special offers.
privacy.forTheFollowingListItemFour: Protecting the website and users against fraud or unauthorized access.
privacy.protect: How do we protect your data?
privacy.weProtect: We use modern security measures to protect your personal information from loss, misuse or unauthorized access. This includes encryption, firewalls and access controls.
privacy.gdpr: According to the GDPR, you have the following rights
privacy.gdprListItemOne: You have the right to request what information we have about you.
privacy.gdprListItemTwo: You have the right to request the correction of inaccurate personal data about you.
privacy.gdprListItemThree: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data, unless we have a legitimate reason to retain it
privacy.gdprListItemFour: You can request that we transfer your data to another controller.
privacy.gdprListItemFiveSpan: Right to object to data processing:
privacy.gdprListItemFive: You have the right to request that we stop processing your data under certain conditions.
privacy.exercise: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at: hackerspace-dev@idi.ntnu.no
privacy.weUseCookies: We use cookies to improve the user experience on our website. A cookie is a small text file that is stored on your device. You can manage cookies in your browser. We use both necessary and functional cookies, as well as third-party information for analysis and advertising.
privacy.thirdPartySharingPurposes: We may share your data with third parties for the following purposes
privacy.thirdPartyListItemOne: For example for website analysis, payment processing or email services.
privacy.thirdPartyListItemTwo: We may share data if necessary to comply with laws or protect our rights.
privacy.privacyChangeClause: We reserve the right to change this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be published on this page and the change date will be updated. We encourage you to regularly read the statement to stay informed about how we protect your privacy.
